title: Fuzzy hyperparameters update in a second order optimization
abstract: arXiv:2403.15416v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: This research will present a hybrid approach to accelerate convergence in a second order optimization. An online finite difference approximation of the diagonal Hessian matrix will be introduced, along with fuzzy inferencing of several hyperparameters. Competitive results have been achieved

translated_title: 在二阶优化中模糊超参数更新的研究
translated_abstract: 本研究将提出一种混合方法，以加速二阶优化中的收敛速度。将介绍对角Hessian矩阵的在线有限差分逼近，以及对几个超参数进行模糊推理。已取得竞争性成果。
tldr: 介绍了一种在二阶优化中加速收敛的混合方法，利用在线有限差分逼近对角Hessian矩阵，并应用模糊推理于多个超参数。
en_tdlr: Introduces a hybrid approach to accelerate convergence in second order optimization, utilizing online finite difference approximation of the diagonal Hessian matrix and fuzzy inferencing of multiple hyperparameters.
